name: Tap Wolves
description:
Key features include

[Combine action and tower defense]
This is an adorable 3D action tower defense game. Players need to put the tools on the map to stop wolves running off with the sheep, and click on the wolf to stun it or get rid of it. Players can collect the wool to upgrade defenses and complete the mission

[Beautiful Graphics]
Developed by famous unreal engine, with dynamic lighting, the game provides better game graphics and game experience. In different game scenes, players can experience seasons change and day-night change.

[Various free Props ]
Various free props help players to save the sheep
Scarecrow: Block wolves’ routes
Corn Cannons: Shoot wolves with corn bullet
Ice machine: Slow down the wolves
Bomb: Causes Explosion
Helicopter: Call helicopters to drop watermelon bomb
